page.title: 13Stoulton Garage, Stoulton
page.content: Stoulton Garage is the only petrol station in the village. The building, originally a house, is over 100 years old and has been a garage for over 40 years. The garage gets a lot of custom from nearby towns and from people commuting to Worcester. The garage employs about twelve people including mechanics, pump attendents and salesmen. The times of business are 7.30 am. to 7.30 pm. It is very busy at weekends because it is the last petrol stop before the M5 Motorway. The A44 Mainroad is a great stimulant to trade as it carries a lot of through traffic. The garage is a Honda agency and a supplier of Alfa-Romeo cars. It provides mechanical servicing facilities. Most of the staff live in or near Stoulton.
